Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES

Title: Relates to the appointment and promotion of certain personnel of the sanitation department of the city of New York
Summary: Authorizes the promotion of personnel to the positions of General Superintendent 2 and General Superintendent 3; provides that such positions shall be filled as far as practicable by promotion from among persons holding competitive class positions in a lower grade in the sanitation department of the city of New York in which the vacancy exists.
LawCode: Add ยง59-e, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to the appointment and promotion of certain personnel of the sanitation department of the city of New York
